MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Ulundi Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.16pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at Hagg Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.15pm on Wednesday 6th January 2021.
